_header: If thou thy life in sin have led
_description: James Ryman, An exhortation to repentance — five quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘Of a synner he wille no deth’ and burden: ‘Thus seith Ihesu of nazareth / Of a synner I wille noo deth’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Yf thou thy lyfe in synne haue leddeAmende the now benot a
                    dredde…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Thy soule to blis then wil he takeOf a synner he will no
                    deth
